name: Darrell Zhou
description: Zhou is a street vendor atThe ManufactoryinArroyo,Santo Domingo. He has a sister, Shenna. At some point before Darrell's meeting withV, Shenna was a streetkid alongside her friendsBrad StacyandVance Noren, often stealing fromcorporates. However, after growing up, Shenna left behind her previous life and became employed underZetatech, much to the anger of Brad and Vance.
